location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, to Major George Benjamin Brooks, Commander of the Second Battalion, Eleventh Regiment, Bombay

mods.abstract: In this letter Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire, informs Major George Benjamin Brooks of the death of a sepoy from Brooks's battalion, which occurred on 8 March 1824. The letter is followed by a statement of the late sepoy's accounts.
